title: Homeopathic Academy of Naturopathic Physicians
author: Nazar Hotsa
description: Join the Homeopathic Academy of Naturopathic Physicians in our enthusiasm for all things Homeopathy!
cleaned_text: Our Activities - Protecting your access to safe & effective homeopathic medicines. [Homeopathic continuing education](https://hanp.net/education/ce-courses/). - Providing [board certification in classical homeopathy](https://hanp.net/dhanp-certification/)to naturopathic physicians. - Working with organizations towards the advancement of the homeopathic profession. Our Mission The mission of the Homeopathic Academy of Naturopathic Physicians is to promote excellence in the practice of homeopathy among naturopathic physicians. We establish and uphold specialist standards, provide education and mentorship, and are committed to protect and preserve homeopathy as a core therapeutic modality within the naturopathic profession. Join Us We are excited to hear your interest in joining! General membership is open to everyone, while specialty certification is reserved for qualified naturopathic physicians.
